thread.title: Paul Manafort: US Treasury officials 'find information on former Donald Trump adviser's offshore financial activities'
thread.title_full: Paul Manafort: US Treasury officials 'find information on former Donald Trump adviser's offshore financial activities'

author: Will Worley
title: Paul Manafort: US Treasury officials 'find information on former Donald Trump adviser's offshore financial activities'
text:
Thursday 23 March 2017 10:23 GMT Click to followThe Independent US Paul Manafort worked extensively for the Trump Presidential campaign Win McNamee/Getty Images 
US Treasury officials are apparently investigating the offshore financial activities of Donald Trump's former campaign manager, Paul Manafort. 
Investigators have found information relating to transactions in Cyprus, the AP reports. 
He is reportedly being investigated as part of a federal anti corruption probe into his work in Eastern Europe.
